body: For those waiting for a translation: Reimu hires a guy to help out around the shrine, but pays him the equivalent of peanuts. Guy decides to give her a nightly visit, saying that if she's gonna pay him so little, then he'll take the rest of his payment with Reimu's body. After they have sex, Reimu sets new employment conditions, saying she'll pay him with her body moving forward, but no more "surprises". Protag wonders if he should be happy or worried about this turn of events, while Reimu gloats to herself that all is going according to keikaku (keikaku means "plan"). I may get around to translating this one some day, but that should explain things in case I never get around to it.
